recipe.title: Poached Filets Mignons with Horseradish Sauce
ingredients: four 4-ounce fully trimmed center-cut filets mignons
Accompaniment: Butternut Squash, Turnip, and Green-BeanQuinoa
instructions: Season filets with salt and pepper. In a 2-quart saucepan heat demiglace and water just to a simmer and add steak. Add some boiling water to mixture if necessary to make enough liquid to just cover steak. Poach steak at a bare simmer (meat will toughen if liquid is allowed to boil), without turning, 8 minutes and remove from broth. Boil broth over high heat until reduced to about 1/2 cup and stir in mustard and horseradish. Keep sauce warm over low heat and halve steaks horizontally.
